Sentencas: Yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) thin films were reactively sputter-deposited by high power impulse magnetron sputtering (HiPIMS) and pulsed direct current magnetron sputtering (DCMS).
Titulo: Deposition of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films by high power impulse magnetron sputtering and pulsed magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: The use of substrate bias voltage was studied in both modes of deposition as a process parameter to promote the growth of dense and less columnar films.
Titulo: Deposition of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films by high power impulse magnetron sputtering and pulsed magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: Films were deposited on both Si(100) and NiO-YSZ fuel cell anodes.
Titulo: Deposition of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films by high power impulse magnetron sputtering and pulsed magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: The texture, morphology and composition of the deposited films were investigated with regard to their application as thin electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Deposition of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films by high power impulse magnetron sputtering and pulsed magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: Independent of the deposition mode the films were found to be stoichiometric.
Titulo: Deposition of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films by high power impulse magnetron sputtering and pulsed magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: The application of substrate bias voltage had opposite effects on texture and crystallinity of films deposited by pulsed DCMS and HiPIMS.
Titulo: Deposition of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films by high power impulse magnetron sputtering and pulsed magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: Films deposited by pulsed DCMS became highly crystalline and < 220 > textured at high bias voltage whereas bias applied to HiPIMS deposited films disrupted crystal growth leading to deterioration of crystallinity.
Titulo: Deposition of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films by high power impulse magnetron sputtering and pulsed magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: Comparing film morphology, it was found that pulsed DCMS films were columnar and contained voids regardless of the applied substrate bias.
Titulo: Deposition of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films by high power impulse magnetron sputtering and pulsed magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: When depositing by HiPIMS a window of operation at a bias voltage of 25 V to 50 V was found in which it is possible to deposit non-columnar thin films without voids and cracks as desired for SOFC applications.
Titulo: Deposition of yttria-stabilized zirconia thin films by high power impulse magnetron sputtering and pulsed magnetron sputtering
